quest.name: Unknown Ultimatum
journal: Margyt is in the middle of a heated discussion.

You happen upon an unknown man offering Margyt some sort of ultimatum, then leaving. She is part of Dominiac's unit, and the troops know that he is up to something─they have not been sent out after the Dravanian Horde in quite some time now. The only option, as Margyt sees it, is to take action of their own accord. Talk to Ayleth for further details.

A scout from another unit was attacked by a dragon─quite an impressive one, if rumor is to be believed. Killing this beast would help make up for the time wasted waiting for orders from Dominiac. The attack happened at Red Rim, to the south of the Convictory. Rendezvous with Ayleth there.
Some members of the scouting party fell to the dragon's attack. Their bodies should be nearby, as should the dragon. Find a body. The attacker will not be far from it.
You have found a body and slain the dragon that was lurking near it. Inform Ayleth of the situation.
Ayleth congratulates you on an impressive kill and asks you to deliver the fang you recovered from the beast to Margyt.

Margyt, too, congratulates you on your victory. She thanks you for the fang, but comments that it does not seem to have come from the dragon that attacked the scouts. That beast was much larger─or so the survivors claim.
objectives: Speak with Ayleth at Red Rim.
Deliver the dragon fang to Margyt.

dialogue.name: AILETH
dialogue.text: What is it? I'm busy.

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: We will try it eventually. You'll have my answer once we do.

dialogue.name: AYASHII01889
dialogue.text: (-Noble-looking Man-)Do you realize that your unit is the laughingstock of the Convictory? I will only wait so long for your answer.

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: Did your mother never tell you not to eavesdrop? But seeing as you're already listening, do you think you could help me out with something?

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: Dominiac is my commanding officer. I don't know what he's been plotting lately, but we haven't been sent out to hunt Dravanians for quite some time now.

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: Every night the other units come back with more notches in their spears. And we're just sitting around doing nothing. The longer we wait for orders from Dominiac, the more we get left behind.

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: ...So we've decided to stop waiting. I'm planning to gather the troops and head out on our own to get a few kills under our belts. Do you think you could lend a hand?

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: Ayleth here can fill you in on the details. She can seem a little odd sometimes, but she's a good girl.

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: Talk to Ayleth for more details. She's a little odd, but don't worry. She's a good girl.

dialogue.name: AILETH
dialogue.text: Yes. I'm Ayleth. Who are you?

dialogue.name: AILETH
dialogue.text: Understood. I was just about to gather the troops.

dialogue.name: AILETH
dialogue.text: A scout from another unit just got back. He says they were attacked by a dragon. A big one. This is our chance at a good kill.

dialogue.name: AILETH
dialogue.text: They were attacked at Red Rim, to the south. Let's go.

dialogue.name: AILETH
dialogue.text: The scouts were attacked near here. Some of them were killed. Find one.

dialogue.name: AILETH
dialogue.text: Those dead scouts should be nearby. Find one.

dialogue.name: AILETH
dialogue.text: Did you find a dead scout?

dialogue.name: AILETH
dialogue.text: A dragon? By yourself?

dialogue.name: AILETH
dialogue.text: That's your kill. You get the credit. But tell me how you did it.

dialogue.name: AILETH
dialogue.text: I must grow stronger! I must rise above the fools inhabiting this realm!

dialogue.name: AILETH
dialogue.text: Pretend you didn't hear that. Take that dragon fang back to Margyt. I'll deal with the scout's body.

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: Ah, welcome back. Something tells me you have a present for me.

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: A dragon's fang! That's quite an achievement. You clearly know how to handle yourself in a fight.

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: But this fang is smaller than what I'd been led to expect. Perhaps the dragon you slew is not the one that attacked the scouts.

obj.n: He Who Would Not Be Denied
